explains: v. 潜入水中（submerge 的过去分词）；使陷入
wordGroup: submerged fermentation 深层发酵，底部发酵
submerged pump 浸没泵，液下泵；潜水泵
submerged arc welding machine 埋弧焊机

sentences.en: The fields had been submerged by floodwater.
My right toe struck against a submerged rock.
sentences.cn: 我的右脚趾撞到一块水面下的石头。

sentences.en: Her submerged car was discovered in the river by police divers.
sentences.cn: 她被水淹没的汽车给警方的潜水员找到了。
